meanings.definition: To skate beyond or surpass in skating.
meanings.sent1: She was overskating her competitors with ease.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys overskating on the frozen pond every winter.
meanings.sent3: The penguin was overskating so fast that it made the other animals dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for overskating was like a graceful dance on ice.
meanings.sent5: The champion overskating across the rink left a trail of admiration in their wake.

meanings.definition: The act of skating beyond or surpassing in skating.
meanings.sent2: The overskating competition drew a large crowd of spectators.
meanings.sent3: The overskating event turned into a friendly race between friends.
meanings.sent4: His overskating performance was a display of pure athleticism.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of overskating under the moonlight was truly magical.
